Breadth-First.Explanation: Generic broad clue collection with no hypothesis, preparing to observe overall image.
Continues broad observation by listing many man-made clues without focusing on one hypothesis.
Further broad observation by listing natural elements, still in divergent clue gathering mode.

Depth-First.Explanation: Focuses on a single key clue (‘Quintumsstraße’) and attempts targeted verification by searching that street name.

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shift from listing general clues to focusing on and verifying the single street-name clue.
